info.name: YouTube Minimalista
info.description:
A cleaner youtube
!use it with dark theme turned on!
info.additionalInfo:
Features
-Slightly rounded corners for video thumbnails.
-Removed border and background for search bar.
-Changed the top colour to match the rest of the page.
-Removed ugly scrollbar.
-Changed style of dropdowns to match the rest of the page.
-Theatre mode background colour changed to match the rest of the page.
-Searchbox centered.
(This only looks good in dark mode youtube)

Change log:
-User icons reverted back to circles.
-Search button brought back with hover effect.
-Links are now more obvious.
